summary: A website for young people to plan, manage, and improve their studies, work, habits, and goals in one simple place
architectural_notes: Core focus: unified dashboard for life management (studies, work, habits, goals)
Design priority: simplicity and ease of use

existing_features.title: Build a frontend dashboard that displays an overview of all studies, work items, habits, and goals with quick access to each section
Build a frontend studies management interface with forms to add, edit, and delete study entries, and display them in an organized list or grid
Build a frontend work management interface with forms to add, edit, and delete work items, and display them sorted by deadline or priority
Build a frontend habits tracking interface that allows users to add habits, mark daily completions, and view progress streaks and completion history
Build a frontend goals management interface with forms to create goals with milestones, track progress, and mark milestones as completed
Integrate Internet Identity authentication so each user has a private workspace for their studies, work, habits, and goals
Design a cohesive visual theme for the platform with warm, energetic colors, clean typography, and an encouraging atmosphere that motivates young users to stay organized and productive
Render generated hero banner image and section icons as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
Update the website title in frontend/index.html from 'Life Planner' to 'MOMENTUM'
Update the logo text in the Layout component header from 'Life Planner' to 'MOMENTUM'
Update the hero section heading in the Landing page from 'Life Planner' to 'MOMENTUM'

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a backend data model to store user studies with fields for subject name, description, study schedule, and progress tracking
Create a backend data model to store user work items with fields for project name, description, deadlines, and completion status
Create a backend data model to store user habits with fields for habit name, description, frequency target, and tracking history
Create a backend data model to store user goals with fields for goal title, description, target date, milestones, and completion status
